title: Colors Around Me
description: A person describes colors of different objects
transcript: Look around! There are many colors. The sky is blue. The grass is green. The sun is yellow. My shirt is red. My bag is black. The flowers are pink and purple. The clouds are white. My shoes are brown. I like all colors, but my favorite color is blue. What is your favorite color?

questions.question: What is the speaker's favorite color?
